name: Red-Pepper Coulis 2 minutes
keywords: gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, red bell pepper
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound red peppers, cored, seeded and diced
1 medium-size tomato, peeled, seeded and diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium-size skillet combine the red peppers, tomato, onion and stock. Cook until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in the basil and thyme.
Puree in a blender. Pour into a clean skillet; cook over medium-high heat until 1 1/2 cups remain.
